dc:title: Prophet Without Honor
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Incorporated into her book Loaves and Fishes (1963), particularly chapter 10. A brief history of Ammon Hennacy's life. Describes his somewhat irritating character and his active dedication to his causes.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 101 1956-06-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
